title: My Pixel 4a turnoff completely when i unplugged it from charge when it was 84%and couldn't turn on
content: I have bought pixel 4a from flipkart big billion day sale and when i unbox it and check the battery%was 50 and i used it for few minutes to transfer my files from my old phone and after that i charge it for 84%and unplugged it from cable but it turn off completely and couldn't turn on.I have tried to hard resist but no sign of working.Battery is working but can't turn on
